constraints.name: interval_empty_check
constraints.description: 每次操作后检查指定区间内所有元素是否为零（即气球是否全部被踩爆）
constraints.formal: ∀ i ∈ [1, m], after each operation, check if ∀ j ∈ [l_i, r_i], a_j = 0

constraints.name: operation_sequence
constraints.description: 操作序列是在线的，每个操作依赖于前一个操作的结果进行解密
constraints.formal: x_t = (\hat{x}_t + lastans - 1) \bmod n + 1, where lastans is the answer of the previous query

constraints.name: valid_operation
constraints.description: 每次操作必须从一个非空盒子中取出一个元素（即气球）
